useCase.name: Interactive Data Usage and Sharing
useCase.description: An interactive process to learn about data usage, update permission settings, and optionally grant/retract data sharing with external services.

preconditions.precondition: The user is logged into the system and accessing their account page.

useCase.trigger: Accessing the data management section of the user account.

mainSequence.step: The user inquires about personal data usage to the ALFRED Interface.
ALFRED Interface retrieves the privacy information from the PrivacySettings.
ALFRED Interface displays the data usage info.
The user updates data sharing permissions via the Interface.
ALFRED Interface navigates to the PrivacySettings.
PrivacySettings confirms updates to the user.
